author: newsr.in
title: Metal Gear Solid V: The Phantom Pain Comes to LittleBigPlanet 3 - newsR
text: The team at Sony in charge of the LittleBigPlanet 3 franchise is announcing that gamers can now pick up a special costume pack linked to the now available Metal Gear Solid V: The Phantom Pain, which is designed to introduce new content for gamers to use for Sackboy, Toggle, OddSock, and Swoop. The official announcement states, "These co... Â»
